turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi would like to order a coffee from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What location would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 455 N 3rd St #100, Phoenix, AZ 85004

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of coffee do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order an espresso

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of espresso would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A Cafe Americano

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a tall 12 ounce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes two packets

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any flavors added?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I would like vanilla

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How about whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I would like whipped cream

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want anything else with your order such as a muffin?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I would like a blueberry muffin

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok the total of your order is $6.99

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok please place the order with my visa credit card

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink is on order at the Starbucks located at 455 N 3rd St #100, Phoenix, AZ 85004

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your welcome
